name: Tofu Topple
description:
Deep in a forest, nestled between towering mountains legend tells of a magical gateway that will take you into combat against other great warriors, the winner being granted immortality.

Tofu Topple is a match-three competitive puzzle game where you face off against friends or play against the AI in a quest to be the best and gain immortality! Taking place in the Welgaea universe, characters have a rich history and butt heads striving to be the best!

  • Story mode, as well as time attack and endless modes
  • Local and online versus
  • Nine playable characters each with a different attack gem
  • Unlockable character bios
